settings.text:
The HoMie Street Store and the HoMie Apparel clothing range are ‘social enterprises’ by Conscious Creative Limited. Conscious Creative Limited is a not-for-profit organisation and Australian charity that was established in February 2015 to support young people affected by homelessness and hardship.

Being a not-for-profit organisation, 100% of HoMie’s profits go towards achieving its mission -to support young people affected by homelessness or hardship.Conscious Creative Limited directors volunteer their time, and the organisation does not have private shareholders.

Visit Us

The HoMie Store - 296 Brunswick St, Fitzroy, VIC 3065. Our current opening hours are: 

 10am-6pm Thursdays & Fridays

 11am-5pm Saturdays & Sundays

Contact Us

For all production, order, stock, or general store enquiries: store@homie.com.au

For general or volunteering enquiries: info@homie.com.au

For all media or marketing enquiries: nick@homie.com.au 

For all fundraising/donation enquiries or activities visit MyCause or our Donation page.

For HoMie Creative enquiries for campaigns or studio hire: creative@homie.com.au 

You should expect a response to your enquiry within 3 working days.

Conscious Creative
